user_story: As a traveler, I want to quickly convert local prices into home currency so that budgeting is easy and overspending can be avoided.
As an online shopper, I want to see product prices in a preferred currency to compare deals and make informed purchasing decisions.
As a business owner, I want to monitor real-time exchange rates to make timely and strategic decisions.
As a user, I want to view historical exchange rate data to understand trends and analyze performance.
As a user, I want to convert an amount from one currency to multiple others to reduce manual effort.
